recepies.description: A simple and delicious chocolate cake.
recepies.instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 180Â°C. 2. Mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and baking soda in a bowl. 3. Add eggs, milk, and oil and stir. 4. Pour batter into a greased cake pan. 5. Bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

recepies.description: A healthy chicken salad with fresh vegetables.
recepies.instructions: 1. Grill the chicken breast and slice it. 2. Toss the mixed greens, cucumbers, tomatoes, and red onions in a bowl. 3. Add grilled chicken and your favorite dressing. 4. Serve chilled.
